lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: Oh Mein Gott! How are you alive?

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: Why are you speaking like that Snorlie?

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I was set to Japanese mode because I came from Japan.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I just had the weirdest dream right now.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I dreamt I was a stuffed toy for this girl.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I was always on her bed, frozen in place.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: All I did was watch her make out with her boyfriend all the time.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: And they would suffocate me when they used me as a pillow.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Yeah... actually, the girl from my dream calls me Snorlie too.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: You actually look kind of like her...

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: How'd you even know my name was Sno--

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: The one where I say random ticks, like poo poo.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Are you the girl from my drea--

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: Have you seen any monkeys pass through here?

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I heard a lot of them scurrying over to the jungle.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I think they were carrying something.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: I don't really remember, I was too busy sleeping hehe.

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: Oh no! That's must my boyfrien--

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: What?! Why did the Monkeys have your baby?!

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: They said they'll sacrifice him to Klat Yeknom.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: He is a vicious monster who cannot rest when he is awakened.

lines.speaker: Cb
lines.text: Oh no! My poor baby. I must save him.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: And to do that I must train you.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Start by running and jumping over those holes over there.
